设计的脂肪细胞饥饿肿瘤并预防癌症生长科学家将能量存储的白脂肪细胞转变为燃烧卡路里的“米色”脂肪。一旦植入，他们就会占据资源的肿瘤，在实验室实验中击败了五种不同类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/ deangineered-fat-cells-starve-tarve-tumors-and-pumors-and-prevent-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/发动机fat-fat-cells-starve-tumors-and-pumors-and-prevent-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9405693E-69E6-438A-820B-27342004F4C6 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 08:47:00 -0500 Engineered fat cells starve tumors and prevent cancer growth
新发现为停止儿童脑肿瘤开始之前提供了希望生病儿童医院的科学家（病态）已经发现了一种停止肿瘤生长的方法，然后它开始以髓母细胞瘤的亚型开始，这是最常见的儿童恶性脑癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-discovery offers-hope-for-for-for-childhood-childhood-childhood-brain-tumors-beforeforeforeforefore-before-they-start.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-discovery offers-hope-for-for-for-childhood-childhood-childhood-brain-tumors-be------------ https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13E90BB0-913D-4394-99A4-ED36EC28C4FF Tue, 04 Feb 2025 08:43:02 -0500 New discovery offers hope for stopping childhood brain tumors before they start

新的基因疗法显示出终身治疗下磷酸的希望在过去的10年中，唯一有效的次磷酸（HPP）治疗方法是一种酶替代疗法，必须每周通过注射三次进行三次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-gene-therapy-shows-promise-promise-for-lifelong-lifelong-treatment-hypophophatasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-gene-therapy-shows-promise-promise-for-lifelong-treatment-of-hypophophatasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb3EA532-2E3C-4B60-A07B-CF1DC33334384 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 08:01:00 -0500 New gene therapy shows promise for lifelong treatment of hypophosphatasia
交通延误增加了快餐范围的拜访和不健康的饮食习惯是否曾经注意到，在交通拥堵后，拿起快餐吃晚饭还有多少诱人？不仅仅是你。伊利诺伊州新大学Urbana-Champaign研究研究表明，交通延误大大增加了对快餐店的访问，导致每年数百万的饮食不健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/traffic-delays-increase-fast-fast-fast-food-food-visits-and-unhealthy-eating-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/traffic-delays-increase-fast-fast-fast-food-visit--visits-and-unhealthy-eating-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4de75fe-0228-4D3D-85CE-3792DCE04585 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 07:53:56 -0500 Traffic delays increase fast food visits and unhealthy eating habits

对于加利福尼亚农场工人，墨西哥医生的远程医疗访问填补了空白小说家约翰·斯坦贝克（John Steinbeck）闻名的沿海山谷有时被亲切地称为“美国沙拉碗”，尽管种植和收获主要由墨西哥的移民完成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/for-california-farmworkers-telehealth-visits-with-mexican-doctors-fill-a-a-gapx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/for-california-farmworkers-telehealth-visits-with-mexican-doctors-fill-a-a-gap.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=487d4a97-8fd6-40f8-93bb-93bb-9b6aa3cee1fd Tue, 04 Feb 2025 06:07:29 -0500 For California farmworkers, telehealth visits with Mexican doctors fill a gap
乌干达启动了苏丹埃博拉病毒的首次疫苗试验在全球第一，乌干达卫生部，世界卫生组织（WHO）和其他合作伙伴今天开始了苏丹病毒物种的埃博拉疫苗试验，并以前所未有的速度在紧急情况下进行随机疫苗试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/uganda-launches-first-first-ever-ever-vaccine-trial-for-sudan-ebola-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/uganda-launches-first-first-ever-ever-vaccine-trial-for-for-sudan-ebola-virous.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e73efe-5542-42E4-8A65-05F91CD573A9 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 06:04:44 -0500 Uganda launches first ever vaccine trial for Sudan Ebola virus
